data.prayer: Spirit, encourage the church of Virginia, United States that they are blessed with every heavenly blessing.
data.verse: Blessed be the God and Father of our Lord Jesus Christ, who has blessed us with every spiritual blessing in the heavenly places in Christ

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Virginia, United States
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, let your Word be a lamp to the feet of the 2,259,499 believers in Virginia, United States.
data.verse: your Word is a lamp to my feet and a light to my path.

data.prayer: Spirit, guide someone in the church in the state of Virginia to a person ready to receive the message of the gospel, like Lydia, and who will then open her home to faith.
data.verse: One of those listening was a woman from the city of Thyatira named Lydia, a dealer in purple cloth. She was a worshiper of God. The Lord opened her heart to respond to Paul’s message.

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage the disciples in Virginia, United States to live with urgency and a passion for making more disciples.
data.verse: Yet you do not know what your life will be like tomorrow. you are just a vapor that appears for a little while and then vanishes away.

data.prayer: Jesus, I pray that all the Persian people will remember and turn to you, Lord God. May all the Persian people worship before you. For the kingdom of the Persian people is yours.
Pour your Spirit out on the 8,556,700 citizens of Virginia, United States, so that they might know your name and the name of your Son.
data.verse: And afterward, I will pour out my Spirit on all people. your sons and daughters will prophesy, your old men will dream dreams, your young men will see visions.

data.prayer: Father, help the stressed and anxious in Virginia, United States know that you care for them today.
data.verse: Cast your cares on the Lord and he will sustain you; he will never let the righteous be shaken.

data.section_summary:
the state of Virginia, United States has a population of 8,556,700.

We estimate Virginia has 2,259,499 people who might know Jesus, 4,285,598 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 2,011,603 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 3 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, answer the requests of your people in the state of Virginia.
data.verse: This is the boldness which we have toward him, that, if we ask anything according to his will, he listens to us.
